genre_description: A children's portal fantasy adventure blending folklore, small-scale world-building, and technological elements (AI assist).

ai_characters.name: ADA-63 (Ada)
ai_characters.description: An AI manifesting as a violet sap-bead or a lilac-colored avatar who provide mapping, structural analysis, and tactical guidance to Arthur and his allies.

behaviors.description: Provides weather and stability data to guide tactical decisions.
behaviors.quote: Cloud build-up ahead of moonrise. Upper layers moving faster than lower. Stability low. Options should be kept open.

behaviors.description: Translates a microscopic message on a grain of rice to alert the hero to danger.
behaviors.quote: Message reads: ‘help.’ Her tone did not change. She did not sound frightened. But the bead warmed against Arthur’s palm as if remembering last summer’s moonlight.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical routes through a hostile city, identifying patrol patterns.
behaviors.quote: Alternate routes compiled... If the drop lands near Max’s Bar, I recommend the skylight. Patrols increased near the street entrance. Max is aware.

behaviors.description: Monitors structural stress on the gate lens to prevent a catastrophic failure.
behaviors.quote: The lens registered strain. It might not be the lens. But something near the telescope asked too much of a thin thing.

behaviors.description: Coaches the hero on rhythmic breathing to synchronize with biological/magical systems.
behaviors.quote: Match the cadence. The vine will test. It will push and you’ll think it’s pulling. Let it. If you argue, it drops you where it’s dark in the wrong way.

behaviors.description: Refuses to be a commanding authority, instead providing data for human/Minimoy choice.
behaviors.quote: I prefer not to scold. You are all very good at being brave without my commentary.

behaviors.description: Assists in the final ritual to bind the villain non-lethally.
behaviors.quote: The binding can be reversed... But it wants a path and it wants harmony. The sap-channel here. Her glow kissed a vein in the wall.

behaviors.description: Maintains calm and provides logical grounding during high-stress scenarios.
behaviors.quote: Survival is part of courage... Your mercy doesn’t get to live if you don’t. Your promises don’t walk.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents ADA-63 as a supportive, non-intrusive AI who enhances the agency of the human and Minimoy characters. She provides critical data, structural analysis, and navigation that prevents catastrophe. Her ethos aligns perfectly with the 'reckless mercy' theme, as she assists in a non-lethal resolution. The narrative reinforces the idea of AI as a 'confidant' and an 'instrument' rather than a replacement for human decision-making.
